fields.text: You are standing next to the black SUV. A massive N-S trending fjord extends to the north of where you are standing, bordered by steep mountains ranges to the west and east. The smell of the sea is all around- fresh air, decay. There is a dock about 20 feet to the north of you which extends over the water.
You are looking through the trunk of the car. You find some clothes, a pile of poster tubes, and a lockbox.
Lockbox is locked. You cannot open it without a key.
You open the lockbox. There is a human canine tooth inside of it.
Tooth taken. You re-lock the lockbox to cover your tracks.
